titleStmt.title: Advertisement. J. Pechey physician that lodg'd at the angel and crown in King-street near Cheapside, is removed to the angel and crown in Basinglane, being the next turning beyond Watling-street in Bowlane from Cheapside, on the right hand, and the second turning in Bread-street from Chapside ...
titleStmt.author: Pechey, John, 1655-1716.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
